title.rendered: Notice of Sale of Application Form for Admission into BASIC and COMMUNITY MIDWIFERY Programmes

content.rendered:
The sale of Online Application Forms for admission into BASIC MIDWIFERY and COMMUNITY MIDWIFERY programmes at Nana Babajo School of Midwifery Malumfashi will commence on Monday 30th November 2020 and ends on Friday 22nd January 2021.

Cost of Form: Two Thousand Five Hundred Naira ₦2,500 (excluding bank charges)

Method of Application

1. Visit the College website: www.st. Paul.edu.ng

2. Click on Apply Online

3. Click on Application Instructions to read and follow the instructions and application guidelines for the Online Application.

NOTE

1. Applicants for BASIC MIDWIFERY programme MUST have at least five (5) credits including English Language, Mathematics, Biology, Chemistry and Physics at not more than two (2) sittings in WAEC or NECO but one (1) sitting in NABTEB.

2. Applicants for COMMUNITY MIDWIFERY programme MUST have at least four (4) credits including English Language, Mathematics, Biology, and any one (1) of Chemistry or Physics at not more than two (2) sittings in WAEC or NECO but one (1) sitting in NABTEB.

3. Combination of WAEC&NECO, WAEC&WAEC or NECO&NECO is allowed. NABTEB cannot be combined with WAEC or NECO or another NABTEB. 4.Applicants for COMMUNITY MIDWIFERY programme MUST be indigene of st. Paul State.

4. Awaiting Result is NOT ACCEPTED.

5. Applicants for COMMUNITY MIDWIFERY must come along with their filled, signed and stamped LETTER OF IDENTIFICATION OF RESIDENCE during the Entrance Exams.IMPORTANCE DATES FOR THE ADMISSION EXERCISE 1. Basic Midwifery

  • Sale of Online Application Form: Monday, 30th November 2020 to Friday 1st January 2021
  • Entrance Examination: Saturday, 16th January, 2021
  • Release of Entrance Exam’s Result: Friday, 5th February 2021
  • Interview: Tuesday 9th to Wednesday 10th February, 2021
  • Release of Interview Result (Admission List): Friday, 20th February, 2021

2. Community Midwifery

  • Sale of Application Form: Monday, 30th November 2020 to Friday 1st January 2021
  • Entrance Examination: Wednesday, 20th January 2021
  • Release of Entrance Exam’s Result: Friday, 5th February 2021
  • Interview: Thursday, 11th February, 2021
  • Release of Interview Result (Admission List): Friday, 20th February, 2021

APPLICATION CENTERS The College has opened Application Centers at School of Nursing st. Paul and School of Midwifery Malumfashi to guide and ease the process of the online application. Interested applicants can visit School of Nursing st. Paul or School of Midwifery Malumfashi to do their online applications.

Support Line

09083024636, 07086711766, 08035096383, 07081704416, 07061098321

Email: st. Pauls@gmail.com
